name: Tejas - Texas Hold'em Style Poker
short_description: Tejas is a Texas Hold'em style poker game with advanced statistics and networked multiplayer capabilities.  It heavily uses and relies on Qt and thusly is multiplatform capable.  It is a graphical card game and is intended for enjoyment only.
